name: The Director's Disorder: Pilot Episode
description:
In The Director’s Disorder: Pilot Episode, you’ll play the part of Coal Westwood, retired actor, as you attempt to survive the whims of a deadly killer. To live through the night, Coal will need to avoid antagonizing the Director by following the script or risk his wrath. This is the role of a lifetime.

Features:
- Fully Voiced Dialogue
- Striking Visuals
- Immersive Sound Design
- Multiple Endings

Short Horror Experience
